attributes.description: The Mercedes-Benz is truly a fantastic vehicle, going down in history as a memorable masterpiece. The vehicle is a 2015 Mercedes-Benz CLA220d AMG Line, its fully in tacked and in excellent condition, boldly designed to impress with such an amazing features in it such as power steering, electric mirrors, fully functioning electric windows, multi-functioning steering, central locking remote, reverse camera, panoramic roof, trim black leather seats, paddle shift, xenon lights, radio/CD/AUX input, air conditioning, climate control and excellent legroom for both drive and rear passengers. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as licence, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
